scripts.pretest: npm run test:clean && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.test:chrome-dev3: cross-env TESTENV=dev3 npm start && cross-env TESTENV=dev3 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.js
scripts.test:ie-dev3: cross-env TESTENV=dev3 npm start && cross-env TESTENV=dev3 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome-cit: cross-env TESTENV=cit npm start && cross-env TESTENV=cit wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.js
scripts.test:ie-cit: cross-env TESTENV=cit npm start && cross-env TESTENV=cit wdio ./config/wdio.ie.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome-dev2: cross-env TESTENV=dev2 npm start &&  cross-env TESTENV=dev2 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.js
scripts.test:ie-dev2: cross-env TESTENV=dev2 npm start && cross-env TESTENV=dev2 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome-test1: cross-env TESTENV=test1 npm start && cross-env TESTENV=test1 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.js
scripts.test:ie-test1: cross-env TESTENV=test1 npm start && cross-env TESTENV=test1 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:oim-test1: cross-env TESTENV=test1 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=test1 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:oim-dev1: cross-env TESTENV=dev1 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=dev1 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:oim-dev2: cross-env TESTENV=dev2 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=dev2 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:oim-e2e: cross-env TESTENV=e2e npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=e2e wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:oim-e2e3: cross-env TESTENV=e2e3 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=e2e3 wdio ./config/wdio.chrome.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:ie:oim-test1: cross-env TESTENV=test1 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=test1 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:ie:oim-dev1: cross-env TESTENV=dev1 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=dev1 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.oim.conf.js
scripts.test:ie:oim-e2e3: cross-env TESTENV=e2e3 npm run setupoim && cross-env TESTENV=e2e3 wdio ./config/wdio.ie.oim.conf.js
scripts.report:generate: rimraf coverage && node reports/report-metadata.js && node reports/report-generate.js
scripts.report:oim:generate: rimraf coverage_OIM && node reports/oim-report-metadata.js && node reports/oim-report-generate.js
scripts.reports:clean: rimraf json-reports && rimraf json-report && rimraf sample
scripts.reports:oim:clean: rimraf oim-json-reports && rimraf oim-json-report && rimraf sample
